translation.en: [man, in English] Walk on, old man.

translation.ja: ヤンさん　あと何人？
ヤンさん　あと何人？ 外に２人…

translation.en: Listen, if you don't want it, I will give it to John Kang, or the kid from Shanghai.
translation.ja: 嫌ならジョン･カンか 上海に頼む
オラクルのライト アサンティホイール

translation.en: Perfect. We'll see you at nine.
What are you still doing here?
-Just for tonight. -No, I mean what's happening
translation.ja: トミーの手伝い フードトラックで音楽祭を 巡る話はどうなった？

translation.en: with the... the food truck idea? You know, traveling around the music festivals.
translation.ja: フードトラックで音楽祭を 巡る話はどうなった？
フードトラックで音楽祭を 巡る話はどうなった？ 実現する

translation.en: -It's happening. Don't worry. -If you need help on the money part,
translation.ja: 心配するな 資金に困ってるなら 助けになるぜ
資金に困ってるなら 助けになるぜ

translation.en: Dude. Do I look like I need help with the money part?
translation.ja: カネに困ってるように 見える？

translation.en: [laughs] You rea-- You really want me to answer that?
-I know. -You're the sorriest looking jungle rat
translation.ja: いや 見たことないほどの ボロネズミだ

translation.en: I've ever seen in my life.
translation.ja: 見たことないほどの ボロネズミだ

translation.en: Uh... Eh. Table three. Thank you.
Hey, hey, hey, hey. Listen, man, I'm serious.
If you need help with the money,
You, my friend, you have a dream.
translation.ja: お前は友達で夢がある

translation.en: Okay. But when you're ready, let me know.
translation.ja: 必要になったら知らせろ

translation.en: I'll get you a deal on a truck, we'll trick it out at the shop.
translation.ja: トラックを手に入れて デコって―

translation.en: It'll be the envy of food truck owners everywhere.
translation.ja: 周りがねたむ車にする

translation.en: As soon as we... explain to them what the word "envy" means.
translation.ja: “ねたむ”の意味を 教えようぜ

translation.en: The girl I was with last night, she said I was.
translation.ja: 昨夜の女にも言われた

translation.en: -You know where to find me, right? -Hey, stay out of jail.
translation.ja: 会いに来い ムショには入るな

translation.en: I told you no peanuts. In anything.
translation.ja: ピーナツ抜きと言ったろ？

translation.en: No! I won't do it again. No!
[in Cantonese] Apologize to her, not me!
[in English] Jimmy, get out of here!
Okay, come on. Hey, guy. Come on. Come on. Nobody got hurt.
translation.ja: いいじゃないか ケガはしてない

translation.en: It's all good, it's party time--
[in English] What's the matter with you? Are you stupid?
Those guys are Triad, they'll fuck you up.
translation.ja: 三合会(トライアド)の人間だぞ

translation.en: They'll blow your brains out, asshole.
I'll take care of it. Go.
translation.ja: あとは任せろ 行け

translation.en: You said you're gonna buy your own food truck, hit the road.
translation.ja: フードトラックの 夢があるのに

translation.en: Twice a day, till you're gone. Good night.
translation.ja: 旅立つまで１日２回だ おやすみ
ありがとう　ヤンさん

translation.en: Good morning, Jenny! Say hi to Auntie Wah for me!
translation.ja: 〈ジェニー お母さんによろしく〉

translation.en: -[in English] Are you okay? -Ow! Shit, man. Let me sleep.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ チクショウ　眠い

translation.en: -Tommy, what happen-- -Cut it out, Jenny! Stop!
Was it someone at the party? Were people fighting in here?
translation.ja: 店でケンカがあったの？

translation.en: He was doing me a favor, and got into it with that guy Chen...
translation.ja: 手伝いを頼んだら チェンとケンカに…

translation.en: He-- He's fine. I-- I got him out of here before anything happened.
translation.ja: カイは大丈夫だ　逃がした

translation.en: You have to fix this. I don't want Kai to--
Kai can take care of himself!
And those guys, they won't mess with a friend of mine. They're my brothers.
translation.ja: チェンたちは仲間だ 手は出さない

translation.en: No, they're fucking criminals! And I don't want them in here, okay?
translation.ja: 犯罪者よ　店に入れないで

translation.en: I don't need my-- my sister's permission to have a... a little... [sighs]
translation.ja: 妹の許可が必要かよ ちょっとした…

translation.en: Don't worry about it. I'll clean it up.
Have you ever heard of Little Pete?
He was the first Chinese millionaire in the United States.
translation.ja: アメリカで初めて 百万の富を築き―

translation.en: The, uh... The first Chinaman to refuse to carry papers required by the Geary Act.
translation.ja: 中国人排除の法律に 抵抗した初の華僑だ

translation.en: The first dragon head in Chinatown.
translation.ja: チャイナタウンの大老(ボス)

translation.en: People said crossing Little Pete was like... erasing your name from God's journal.
translation.ja: ボスに逆らうのは神の書から 名前を消すに等しい

translation.en: Everybody wanted a piece of Little Pete.
translation.ja: 皆がピートの命を狙った

translation.en: Hatchet men were... were imported from China to assassinate him.
translation.ja: 中国本土からは暗殺者が 送り込まれたし

translation.en: The Irish tried to burn him out of the docks. The police came after him with clubs and silly ordinances,
translation.ja: アイルランド人も暗殺を企て 警察も彼を狙って

translation.en: designed to kill his soul and drive him out of Chinatown.
translation.ja: アイルランド人も暗殺を企て 警察も彼を狙って 追放しようとしたが失敗した
追放しようとしたが失敗した

translation.en: Little Pete was willing to do whatever's necessary
to protect his business, his people, his territory.
translation.ja: 仕事や仲間や縄張りを 守るためならな

translation.en: I want you to tell Alec McCullough...
translation.ja: アレック･マクロウに伝えろ

translation.en: where he'll end up, should he continue his incursions into Chinatown.
translation.ja: チャイナタウンに 手を出せば命はない

translation.en: On second thought, I think he'll get the message.
translation.ja: このほうが奴に伝わる

translation.en: [man] Two bodies were found in a shipping container this morning.
translation.ja: 今朝コンテナで ２つの遺体が見つかった

translation.en: Triad's fingerprints are all over this.
The victims were known associates of Alec McCullough.
translation.ja: 犠牲者たちのボスはマクロウ

translation.en: Six months ago, he relocated to San Francisco.
translation.ja: 半年前に サンフランシスコに移った

translation.en: Now, McCullough's already tried to squeeze into Chinatown, but the dragon head, Uncle Six, ain't havin' it.
translation.ja: チャイナタウンを狙うも シックスがそれを許さない

translation.en: My Spidey sense says we're gonna have a gang war if we don't calm things down.
translation.ja: 警察が止めないと戦場になる

translation.en: Let 'em take each other out. Less work for us.
There's not gonna be a gang war in Chinatown, Bendix.
translation.ja: そうはならないぞ ベンディックス

translation.en: 'Cause we're gonna be all over this shit before McCullough gets any more situated. That's why.
translation.ja: マクロウがのさばる前に 警察が介入する

translation.en: He's recruited Uncle Six's own guy, Lu Xin Lee,
translation.ja: シックスの部下である ルーシン･リーと

translation.en: Inspector Gavin. She's from Bayview. She's been workin' Vice over there.
translation.ja: ガヴィン捜査官は ベイビュー署の風紀班にいた

translation.en: She's gonna embed in Lee's crew.
Chinese ain't gonna hire a girl to steal cars, boss.
translation.ja: 車の盗みに女は雇わない

translation.en: Gavin's here because she speaks fluent Russian, just like Babinov.
translation.ja: 彼女はバビノフのように ロシア語を話す

translation.en: She's got experience liberating cars from their rightful owners, just like Babinov. She's a fresh face.
translation.ja: 車を盗んだ経験もあるし 奴らに面が割れていない

translation.en: You fuck up in Vice, you go home with a canker sore. You fuck up in Chinatown, you don't go home.
translation.ja: チャイナタウンで失敗すれば 生きて帰れない

translation.en: You don't have to worry about me, Bendix.
The only thing that you got on me...
All right, all right. Let's go.
UC assignments are there in your files. You got eyes and ears on the Triad.
translation.ja: 任務はファイルを見ろ 三合会を見張れ

translation.en: You hear anything ugly, I wanna know about it.
translation.ja: 何か耳にしたら報告を

translation.en: This McCullough... He's a jaundiced motherfucker.
translation.ja: マクロウは厄介な野郎だ
カンパオチキンだよ カンパオチキンだよ 〝クンフード〞

translation.en: Uh, I'll go get some more.
-how'd you like to try the squid? -No.
Moo goo wrap, and lemon chicken salad.
translation.ja: ラップとチキンサラダ

translation.en: Seriously, how much money can you make in a food truck?
Not as much as my boss.
How much you make selling cars?
Not enough, which is why I also steal them.
translation.ja: 足りないから盗んでる

translation.en: You know what I don't get?
You live like a king, but I never see you working.
translation.ja: お前は働かなくても 金回りがいい

translation.en: I live like a dog, bro, and all I do is work.
translation.ja: 俺は犬みたいに働きづめ

translation.en: Yeah, but that's your problem right there, brother.
You think if you don't work like a dog, you're never gonna get anywhere.
translation.ja: 働かないと暮らせないとか

translation.en: You gotta-- You gotta un-Confucius that brain of yours, man.
translation.ja: そういう考えに 捕らわれるなよ

translation.en: But, listen, uh... put a pin in that,
translation.ja: それより― 昨夜 お前が帰った後 チェンとラウが―

translation.en: 'cause I heard about what happened last night with Chen and Lau. After you left...
translation.ja: 昨夜 お前が帰った後 チェンとラウが―

translation.en: those guys took it out on Tommy,
who tried to tell them you're protected, but...
translation.ja: お前は特別だと 話したらしいが

translation.en: You might wanna call Uncle Six.
-Thanks, Kai. See you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
translation.ja: ありがとう また明日

translation.en: They're not gonna let this go.
The Triad will come for you.
-How about you just talk to them for me? -Doesn't work that way, brother.
translation.ja: お前から話してくれ 止められない

translation.en: For what? Who am I gonna shoot?
translation.ja: 何のため？ 誰を撃つ？

translation.en: How about you just don't get shot?
[in Cantonese] Hang up. [in Indonesian] Hang up!
[in English] I've been looking for you, Kai.
It holds the power of a thousand monks.

translation.ja: あなたの物になったわ

translation.en: That is what's going to kill you, if you don't listen to me.
translation.ja: あれが あなたを殺しに来る

translation.en: Those warlords were the first to be corrupted by the elemental powers of the Wu.
translation.ja: 五行の力によって腐敗した 最初の将たちよ
すなわち 地･水･金･木…

translation.en: They waged war against ancient China, leaving the land awash in blood,
translation.ja: 古代中国で戦争を起こし 大地を血で染めた

translation.en: until a thousand holy monks sacrificed themselves
translation.ja: 彼らを止めるために 1000人の僧侶が

translation.en: to empower a Chosen One to stop them.
translation.ja: 選ばれし者に力を与えた

translation.en: What's this got to do with me?
It exists between Heaven and Earth.
You're here because the Wu Powers are still with us.
translation.ja: 五行の力によって ここに呼ばれた

translation.en: Five new warlords are converging on San Francisco as we speak.
translation.ja: サンフランシスコに集結する ５人の将を―
どうやって 殺すのよ

translation.en: I'm not a killer. I'm a chef.
No, Kai. You are the Wu Assassin.
translation.ja: いいえ　あなたは五行の刺客

translation.en: The Monk Piece is in you. It gives you the power of the Thousand Monks.
translation.ja: 僧侶のピースで 1000人の僧の力を得た

translation.en: Their strength flows through you. Their faces protect you.
translation.ja: 彼らの力と顔が あなたを守るわ

translation.en: you'll find the Wu and kill them...
before they destroy your world like they did mine.
translation.ja: 彼らが世界を壊す前にね

translation.en: You're in the hospital, sir. Just had an accident.
translation.ja: 事故で病院に運ばれた

translation.en: You were found on the street. We're gonna take care of you.
translation.ja: 道で発見されたのよ あとは任せて

translation.en: [woman] You've been imbued with the power of the Thousand Monks.
translation.ja: あなたには1000人の 僧侶の力が宿った

translation.en: Their faces will protect you so you can do what they could not.
translation.ja: 僧侶の顔が あなたを守ってくれるわ
ジェニー 何があったの？
事故だ 病院から電話があったわ
病院から電話があったわ

translation.en: I'm in your phone. Emergency contact?
-I'm sorry if shit happened. -Shit did happen.
translation.ja: すまない もう遅い

translation.en: What's-- What's the matter with you?
You don't just... take on the Triad like that. What were you thinking?
translation.ja: 三合会を相手に なぜ あんなこと…

translation.en: I was thinking they broke Jimmy's nose.
And, you know, Tommy never told us not to put peanuts in the--
translation.ja: ピーナツ抜きとは 聞いてないのに…

translation.en: It's so like you. Just can't get out of your own way.
translation.ja: あなたって昔からそんな風よ

translation.en: Could you come work for me?
You don't belong in a food truck, and I could really use you in my kitchen.
translation.ja: 車じゃなくて うちの厨房(ちゅうぼう)で働くべきよ

translation.en: but I've got my own problems right now.
Thanks for coming to get me.
translation.ja: 迎えは ありがとう

translation.en: "There's no friendship without love, and no love without friendship." Hm?
translation.ja: “愛のない友情はない 逆もまたしかり”

translation.en: I don't have time for your Confucius bullshit right now, Mr. Young.
translation.ja: 孔子の格言を 聞いている暇はない

translation.en: He's my human potential thought leader.
translation.ja: 彼の自己啓発は参考になる

translation.en: I'm doing this cleanse, right? Clear my mind, you know, and then Tony said--
translation.ja: 心が浄化されるんだよ トニーいわく…

translation.en: I don't care what Tony says.
translation.ja: トニーはどうでもいい

translation.en: -Here you go, Lu Xin. -Thank you, DeeDee.
translation.ja: どうぞ ありがとう

translation.en: -So, what are you doing later tonight? -Dinner with the hubby.
translation.ja: 今夜は何を？ 夫とディナー

translation.en: -Yeah, you tell him I'll bring the wine. -[laughs]
A little birdie told me that you're looking to hire some people.
translation.ja: 人を雇いたいって聞いたわ

translation.en: Short, Latino dude? Works on auto parts?
translation.ja: ラテン系の男よ 車の部品を売ってる
そのいけ好かない男から

translation.en: also told me that you got a problem with women.
translation.ja: あなたは女癖が悪いと 聞いたけど…

translation.en: DeeDee. Do I have a problem with women?
translation.ja: ディーディー 俺は女癖が悪い？

translation.en: I think you're at the wrong table.
[DeeDee] Can I get you anything to eat, hon?
Your mother was Indonesian and a Muslim. Yet, you come here often.
translation.ja: 母親はムスリムだったが 頻繁に来るんだな

translation.en: The first time was with you.
So you haven't discarded everything I told you.
translation.ja: 少しは絆が残っているか

translation.en: Tell Marshall to watch the car.
-He's going to want to eat after this. -Where?
[in English] This used to be the Song Garden.
Well, they couldn't pay their rents.
Bar could be here. Kitchen behind the glass.
translation.ja: バーを作って ガラス越しに厨房を

translation.en: I'm gonna make the terms very favorable. Ten years...
translation.ja: 好条件の契約だぞ 10年間は―

translation.en: Don't tell me you still feel you don't belong here.
translation.ja: 部外者だとか言うなよ

translation.en: You're my son. Everyone accepts that except you.
translation.ja: 俺の息子だ お前だけが認めない

translation.en: -I don't need your help. -Everybody needs my help.
translation.ja: 助けは不要 あり得ん

translation.en: You see, that's what I don't understand.
I plucked you out of the bowels of a ship.
Saved you from a life of bondage. Raised you in my home.
translation.ja: 苦しい境遇から 救い出して育てた

translation.en: Sent you to school. Introduced to you...
translation.ja: 学校に通わせて お前を家族に迎えた

translation.en: -families whose children are your best-- -I've heard this story.
translation.ja: 学校に通わせて お前を家族に迎えた 知ってる

translation.en: You talk as if your father could've done any of it for you?
translation.ja: お前の父親にできたか？

translation.en: Look! My father loved me and he got me here!
translation.ja: 父さんの愛で 俺は生きてこられた
トミーが呼んでる ありがとう

translation.en: They're lined up around the corner. It's insane.
translation.ja: 客が角まで並んでるわ
もう済んだことよ まただ

translation.en: Can you just accept my apology without making me feel like shit?
translation.ja: 普通に許せよ　惨めになる

translation.en: if Kai hadn't fucked everything up last night, you never even would've known we were here.
translation.ja: カイがしくじらなきゃ あんな騒ぎにならず―

translation.en: That's the way I do things, okay?
I don't-- I don't think you're a total fuckup.
translation.ja: 能無しだなんて思ってない

translation.en: Seriously, I don't know what I spend my money on.
translation.ja: カネの使い道は 決めてないけど

translation.en: I don't. It just, you know, just... poof.
translation.ja: カネの使い道は 決めてないけど 貸してくれよ

translation.en: I get paid on Friday, rent's due tomorrow. I just need you to float me for a couple days.
translation.ja: 金曜には返せる　２日だけだ

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm-- Can you just please forget about the Triad?
translation.ja: お願いだから三合会から 足を洗って

translation.en: You've been talking to Mom and Dad?
Mom and Dad think I'm a fuck-up.
Who cares what Mom and Dad think?
translation.ja: 親がどう思おうと関係ない

translation.en: You can just work here. With me.

translation.ja: お前の店で？ 私の店で！

translation.en: You took a loan from Uncle Six.
-You didn't think I knew, did you? -You're a fucking sneak--
translation.ja: 知ってるぜ 卑怯(ひきょう)よ

translation.en: What would Mom and Dad say if they knew
translation.ja: 父さんたちが悲しむぜ

translation.en: their beloved golden child borrowed money from the Triad,
translation.ja: 優秀な娘が三合会のカネで 店を改装した
優秀な娘が三合会のカネで 店を改装した それは…

translation.en: No, bullshit! Come on! It's just $1,200. That is nothing to you.
translation.ja: お前なら1200ドルぐらい 出せるだろ？

translation.en: It's just 1,200 bucks for two days.
translation.ja: たった２日借りるだけだ

translation.en: -For rent. -For rent, yes. For rent. Shit!
translation.ja: 家賃？ ああ　家賃だとも

translation.en: You better not be fucking with me.

translation.ja: お前にウソはつかない

translation.en: By the way, your two new servers are illegal. Be careful.
translation.ja: ところで不法就労には 気をつけろ

translation.en: She's too easy on the campers. She's gotta turn those tables.
translation.ja: 居座る客に甘い 回転を速めろ

translation.en: I could really use your help.
[man, in English] Don't lie to me! Which key is it?
I told you. I'm not a killer.
The Wu Assassin is a hero and a killer, Kai.
translation.ja: 五行の刺客は正義の人殺し

translation.en: And you are the Wu Assassin.
translation.ja: あなたは その刺客よ

translation.en: -No. Find another way. -There is no other way.
translation.ja: 違う　他を捜せよ 他にはいない

translation.en: The Monk Piece is in you. Evil is attracted to it.
translation.ja: 体内のピースが悪を引き寄せ

translation.en: If you don't kill it, it'll kill you.
translation.ja: 殺さねば 殺される

translation.en: And not just you... but all who stand close to you.
translation.ja: あなただけじゃない 周りの人たちもよ

translation.en: "It is better to be a dog in peaceful times, than a man in times of unrest."
translation.ja: “平和な時代の犬は 混乱期の人間より幸せ”

translation.en: The good people of Chinatown have come to embrace this axiom...
translation.ja: 罪なき住人たちは これを信じている

translation.en: as the Triad has come to rely on the feud and vendetta code of old China to enforce it.
translation.ja: 三合会が古い中国の抗争や 復讐(ふくしゅう)の掟(おきて)に従うように…

translation.en: The streets of Chinatown are ruled by face, fate and favor.
translation.ja: チャイナタウンの路上では 顔と運命と恩恵が物を言う

translation.en: They flow from my hand, to the tongues and fists of my soldiers.
translation.ja: それらは全て俺の手から 部下の舌と拳へと流れる
チャイナタウンの掟を―

translation.en: But then, you took matters into your own hands.
We didn't know he was protected.
We thought he was a chef. A cook. Nobody special.
translation.ja: ただのシェフだと思って…

translation.en: Everyone is someone special until I tell you they're not.
translation.ja: 相手が誰だろうが 俺の許可を待て

translation.en: And what did you do to him?
Nothing. We waited, but he never came home.
translation.ja: 何も 帰ってきませんでした

translation.en: We should be on the lookout for him.
[in Cantonese] Pity he's not here to protect you now.
[man] Just give me a second, all right?
do what I saw you do.
♪ And give a little bit more if you fade ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　藤原 千春
